请输入设备序列号: Please enter the device serial number
将删除设备,是否确认?: Will the device be deleted? Are you sure?
将升级最新版本固件程序，是否确认?: Will the latest version of the firmware program be upgraded? Are you sure?
设备升级指令已下发: The device upgrade command has been issued
将对该设备进行恢复出厂，是否确认?: Is it confirmed that the device will be restored to the factory?
设备恢复出厂指令已下发: The instruction to restore the equipment to factory has been issued
将对该设备进行重启，是否确认?: Will the device be restarted? Are you sure?
设备重启指令已下发: The device restart command has been issued
将删除您所勾选的设备，是否确认?: The device you have selected will be deleted. Are you sure?
将对该设备进行远程开门，是否确认?: Will remote door opening be performed on the device? Are you sure?
设备远程开门指令已下发: The remote door opening command for the device has been issued
设备序列号不能为空: The device serial number cannot be empty
请上传.bin文件，且不超过200MB: Please upload a. bin file, which should not exceed 200MB
